content: the leddy striped hat pattern is an easy peasy meditative project available in five sizes this pattern is gender-neutral and is designed to coordinate with the leddy infinity scarf 1 > **this pattern is available for free on my blog here 2 ** > > the free version is supported by > advertising on my website the > downloadable pdf for sale on ravelry > includes the full pattern in one > printable file without advertisements **skills used** basic crochet stitches chain double_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch crocheting in the round increasing crocheting in the back loop includes links to video tutorial special stitch pattern decrease includes written description and link to video in pattern **skill level** easy **finished sizes** preemie infant toddler/child teen/adult small adult large *photographed sample is size teen/adult small shown on a mannequin with 22 5 57 cm head circumference * preemie 11 28 cm hat circumference x 5 13 cm height infant 14 25 36 cm hat circumference x 5 25 13 5 cm height toddler/child 17 25 44 cm hat circumference x 6 25 16 cm height teen/adult small 20 5 52 cm hat circumference x 8 5 21 5 cm height adult large 23 5 59 5 cm hat circumference x 9 25 23 5 cm height **materials** cascade yarns pacific yarn 60% acrylic/40% superwash merino wool 3 5 oz/100 g/213 yd/195 m 1 skein each in 01 cream ca 117 semolina cb and 179 burnt cinnamon cc *or approximately 25 yd 30 yd 45 yd 70 yd 85 yd /23m 27 5 m 41 m 64 m 77 5 m in each in 3 colors in any medium weight yarn * us size h-8/5 mm crochet hook *or size needed to obtain gauge * yarn needle **gauge** through round 4 in pattern = 4 5 11 5 cm diameter *for best results always check your gauge * 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/leddy-infinity-scarf 2 https //undergroundcrafter com/2024/11/08/leddy-crochet-striped-hat-pattern/
